bibl.title: An Estate Overseer's Work Contract and the Meaning of Exotikoi Topoi. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Edition of P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 325. Contract between an estate and an overseer of a part of its domains. Provenance unknown, V/VI. - Pp. 80-86: Excursus: The Meaning of ἐξωτικοὶ τόποι [a subordinate appendage].
